message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a valuable product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to hearing your thoughts and potentially negotiating the price.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $1,200,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this price would be a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,050,000? This recognizes the product's worth while still being a good deal for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950,000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
